amendment.description: To revise the section on Inspector General reports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4101 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4101 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator McCaskill. (consideration: CR S1669, S1693-1696; text: CR S1694) To revise the section on Inspector General reports.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4101 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4101 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator McCaskill.
